#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main(){
	int t,n,i,j,d=1000001;
	
	char *s;
	s=(char*)calloc(d,sizeof(char));
	
	for(i=0;i<d;i++){
		if(s[i]!=NULL);
		else
			if(i%6==0)
				for(s[i]='1',j=i+8;j<d;j=j+8)
					s[j]='2';
			else
				if(i%8==0)
					for(j=i;j<d;j=j+8)
						s[j]='2';
				else
					s[i]='0';		
	}
	
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	s[0]='0';
	
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		if(s[n]=='0')
			printf("RIDICULOUS\n");
		else
			if(s[n]=='1')
				printf("NO\n");
			else
				printf("YES\n");
	}
	
	free(s);
	
	return 0;
}
